data.heading: Taj Mahal, Agra
data.description: Iconic symbol of love with exquisite Mughal architecture.

data.heading: Goa
data.description: Beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and Portuguese heritage.

data.heading: Jaipur, Rajasthan
data.description: Pink City with majestic forts, ornate palaces, and colorful markets.

data.heading: Kerala Backwaters
data.description: Serene waterways, houseboat cruises, and lush greenery.

data.heading: Leh-Ladakh, Jammu and Kashmir
data.description: Paradise for adventure with snow-capped mountains and Tibetan culture.

data.heading: Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh
data.description: Oldest city with spiritual significance along the Ganges River.

data.heading: Mumbai, Maharashtra
data.description: Bustling city with iconic landmarks, Bollywood, and vibrant street food.

data.heading: Ranthambore National Park, Rajasthan
data.description: Famous for tiger sightings and wildlife safaris in natural habitats.

data.heading: Andaman and Nicobar Islands
data.description: Pristine beaches, coral reefs, and water sports in the Bay of Bengal.
